# Header1 
Data Description

subject: This refers to the volunteer id number for each subject who was measured undertaking the activities. This is an integer between 1 and 30.

activity_code and activity: This is the code and descriptive name for the activity being measured and refers to the activity code. The following values are valid.
1. WALKING
2. WALKING_UPSTAIRS
3. WALKING_DOWNSTAIRS
4. SITTING
5. STANDING
6. LAYING

mean(): Real number values which are the mean grouped by the subject and activity
std(): mean of the standard deviation measurements grouped by the subject and activity
